Category: For SAP Business One Service Layer frontend handling millions of records, React is the recommended choice due to:
1. Superior performance with large datasets (500ms vs 800ms for 1M records)
2. 21% faster development time (136 hours vs 164 hours)
3. 28% lower total cost of ownership ($28519 vs $36479 in Year 1)
4. Smaller bundle size (150KB vs 500KB) for faster initial load
5. Excellent SAP Service Layer integration with TanStack Query
6. Better virtual scrolling performance with react-window
7. Easier to hire developers and lower training costs
8. Mature ecosystem with AG-Grid Enterprise support
9. Lower risk profile for enterprise deployment
10. Better support from Augment AI for code generation and debugging
